overview: A Stop motion Animation by Guldies. 2500 still pictures (4530 taken) played in 18 FPS.  Made in my bedroom on my desk. Shot with a Canon EOS 600D. Animated in Dragonframe, edited in Photoshop and Sony Vegas. Sound effects recorded with a Blue Yeti - a few downloaded from freesound.org
tagline: A Stop motion Animation by Guldies
title: Going Fishing
